logError(String, String) - Method in class controller.ErrorWriter

login() - Method in class view.LoginPanel
Method that holds logic for passing parameters to the crud.login method which, queries for the user w/ matching email/password combo
login(String, String) - Method in class crud.CustomerCrud
Verifies the credentials of a customer by checking the entered email and password against the existing customers in the Customer table
login(String, String, Customer) - Method in class controller.AccountControl
Method which handles the login process by querying the customers table
LoginPanel - Class in view
The LoginPanel class represents the Login Panel in the GrowingPains application It holds the structure and logic for handling the login process with the use of a JPasswordField for the password input
LoginPanel() - Constructor for class view.LoginPanel
Constructs a new LoginPanel, initialising the layout, title, buttons and input fields
